task.title: Window Capture
task.shortdesc: An Agent can capture a selected window in a browser to showcase it while interacting with a customer and/or while recording a screen.

taskbody.context: This section contains the steps to capture a window during screen recording.

step.cmd: Click the ‘+’ icon in the Sources tab.
Select Window from the drop-down options.
Check to select Capture Method as Automatic.

step.stepresult: The window (along with the tabs) to be captured is configured.
